lexUnit.name: spot.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a particular place, point, or position.

sentence.text: After all , you do n't want to be rooted to the spot in front of a microphone -- you want to perform !
I know the spot in Deal ? only a few miles from us .

The sea is as crystal clear as any spot in the Caribbean you might care to name .

3 Just a little further on , a Cornmill entrance ( service bay ) , potentially a very dangerous spot .
